item.description:
TRAVEL OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Ball Mountain Dam, near Jamaica State Park, VT

WHEN: 3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: Enormous outlook over an enormous lake from a dam scenic vista

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. It may not be obvious where the best meeting spot is, so drive towards the dam (right off of route 100) until we find a likely spot.

DIRECTIONS:
To Jamaica Vermont
Interstate 91 to exit 3 Brattleboro Vermont.
Take a right of Vermont route 5 (south) 2 miles.
Take a right on Vermont route 30.
Approximately 25 miles to Jamaica.

LODGING:
I'll be staying at the Jamaica State Park.

http://www.vtstatepar...
Campgrounds / Lodging
� Jamaica State Park Campground - Jamaica, VT 05343 Ph: 802-874-4600
� Winhall Brook campground: Rt 100, Winhall VT (877) 444-6777
� Townshend State Park Campground - Townshend, VT 05353 Ph: 802-365-7500
� Camperama - Depot Road, Townshend, VT 05353 Ph: 802-365-4315
� Bald Mountain Campground - 1760 State Force Road, Townshend, VT 05353 Ph: 802-365-7510
Directions




OTHER:
RSVPs: Required

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, foodIF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.
*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.
INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: TRAVEL OUTING: Ball Mountain Dam, Jamaica, VT
